snippet.title: Polaris SnoCross - Trailer
snippet.description:
Polaris SnoCross - Trailer

Polaris SnoCross is a snocross snowmobile racing game for the Nintendo 64, PlayStation, Game Boy Color and later PC. It was released in 2000. French publisher Wanadoo Edition released a budget version of the game for the PC in 2001, called SnowCross.

Device:
Playstation Classic
Bleemsync 1.2
OTG
Sandisk Cruzer Blade 128 GB

Capture:
Ezcap 284 hd video capture
